derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French letues, laitues, plural of laitue, from Latin lactuca, from lac, lact- 'milk' (because of its milky juice)

entry.def: A lettuce is a plant with large green leaves that is the basic ingredient of many salads.

means.word_mean: 2. any of various plants of the genus Lactuca
3. leaves of any of various plants of Lactuca sativa

sentences.en: Get some lettuce and tomatoes so I can make a salad.
sentences.cn: 买些莴苣和西红柿, 我好做色拉。

jushi.english: Buy a lettuce and some tomatoes.
jushi.chinese: 买一棵生菜和一些番茄。

jushi.english: A green salad has only green vegetables, such as lettuce and cucumber.
jushi.chinese: 所谓绿色沙拉指的是只有绿色的蔬菜，如莴苣和黄瓜等凉拌生菜。
